questions: Can you please provide an overview of your responsibilities and accomplishments during your 1.6 years of experience in the Software Development industry?
What programming languages and technologies are you proficient in?
Have you worked on any notable projects that you can discuss?
How do you stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in software development?
Can you share an example of a challenging problem you faced in your work and how you resolved it?
How do you approach working in a team environment and collaborating with colleagues?
Are you experienced in Agile or other project management methodologies?
How do you prioritize tasks and manage your time effectively in a fast-paced software development environment?
Have you had any experience with software testing and quality assurance processes?
What are your career goals and aspirations in the software development industry?
